required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Camrelizumab Combined With Radiotherapy and Chemotherapy for the Treatment of Recurrent or Metastatic Cervical Cancer
clinical_study.official_title: A Single-arm, Single-center, Open, Prospective Phase II Clinical Study of Camrelizumab Combined With Radiotherapy and Chemotherapy for the Treatment of Recurrent or Metastatic Cervical Cancer

lead_sponsor.agency: Tianjin Medical University Cancer Institute and Hospital

clinical_study.source: Tianjin Medical University Cancer Institute and Hospital

brief_summary.textblock: To evaluate the effectiveness and safety of camrelizumab combined with radiotherapy and chemotherapy for recurrent or metastatic cervical cancer

detailed_description.textblock: This study is a single-arm, single-center, open, prospective phase II clinical study, the main purpose of which is to evaluate the effectiveness and safety of camrelizumab combined with radiotherapy and chemotherapy for recurrent or metastatic cervical cancer.

primary_outcome.description: The objective remission rate refers to the proportion of patients whose tumors have shrunk to a certain amount and maintained for a certain period of time, including cases of complete remission and partial remission

secondary_outcome.description: The period of time between when a patient with neoplastic disease receives treatment and when the disease progresses or death from any cause occurs
The time from the patient's confirmation of the disease to death due to any cause
Refers to the proportion of patients whose tumors have shrunk or stabilized for a certain period of time, including complete remission (CR), partial remission (PR) and stable (SD) cases
Harmful and unrelated reactions that occur when normal doses of drugs are used to prevent, diagnose, treat diseases or regulate physiological functions
Comprehensively evaluate the pros and cons of life by filling in the questionnaire

arm_group.arm_group_label: Camrelizumab combined with radiotherapy and chemotherapy

intervention.description: 200mg/m2, iv, d1, Q3W, a total of 6 cycles
intervention.arm_group_label: Camrelizumab combined with radiotherapy and chemotherapy

intervention.description: 1.8-2.15Gy/time (radiotherapy started on the 8th day of camrelizumab treatment), a total of 28 times (5 times a week), a total of 50.4-60.2Gy.
intervention.arm_group_label: Camrelizumab combined with radiotherapy and chemotherapy

intervention.description: 260mg/m2, iv, d1, Q3W, a total of 6 cycles
intervention.arm_group_label: Camrelizumab combined with radiotherapy and chemotherapy

intervention.description: 80-120mg/m2, iv, d1-3, Q3W, a total of 6 cycles
intervention.arm_group_label: Camrelizumab combined with radiotherapy and chemotherapy
